EX–2 EX–2 "Straw Hat Theatre #2: Report Time"Transliteration: "Mugiwara Gekijō Sono Ni: Report Time" (Japanese:麦わら劇場その2「Report Time」) N/A N/A October 8, 2006(2006-10-08)[n 8] November 23, 2014

A reporter visits the Straw Hat crew to interview them about the food on the ship before Sanji joined.
